property.description: When partialSubmit=true, partialSubmitDelay is the number of milliseconds before changes in selection will cause a partialSubmit to occur. The intention being that when users use the keyboard to navigate through potention options, to get to the intended option for selection, that the rapid keypresses would not cause partialSubmits to occur, for the interim selections, which slow down the process of navigation. Default value is 300 milliseconds. To disable the delay, use -1.
